# Desktop sharing over public internet without installation of any software or plug-in.

== Introduction ==

Application sharing for the purpose of this project is defined as the ability to show in real-time a particular desktop screen to a remote user.
Although this concept is not new, a customized component designed specifically for BigBlueButton with strict guidelines such as pure mobility is what makes this unique.
